item.title:
This explains so much. Despite being an international festival Fr√©maux has been the face of keeping it as white and male as possible.
I always wondered why more journalists didn't question him on why that was. Now I know they are literally barred from doing so.

item.title: R to @women_direct: I can't believe it's been so long but The Fits came out in 2015 and is just one of those movies that has continued to haunt me since I saw it.
